name: The Challenge (itch) (Fancybeserker)
description:
Beat the cave! 

Level up as quickly as possible to beat the monsters but beware, they're getting stronger! Help people from Cityri getting rid of the dark demon, which was setting up several instances before you're able to meet him

This game is ultra challenging and definitely not for people with a short temper and it's more or less trial and error. This game comes with 3 difficulties:

-> Normal

-> Hard

-> Impossibru

Over 100 battles and more coming!

Over 30 skills and even more coming!

Forge your weapons and armors!

This game is in German right now, but there's no to little story behind it. So, it shouldn't be a big deal.

It's a demo and the play time is round about 60 to 90 minutes.
